page.title: 05TOURISM.
page.content: Holiday visitors are now using Sheringham as a centre for East Anglian{tours}or day visits. Large hotels have been replaced by boarding houses, flats, weekend cottages and caravan/campsites. It is a good area for{botanists}with the local varied flora.{Artists}sketch and paint because of the good light and scenery, and{bird_watchers}have several bird sanctuaries in this area. A very fine {golf course}draws many to the town, and the {camera enthusiast}has an ever_changing countryside to draw upon.Drama and comedy at the theatre, choral and organ music in the local churches. It is a town and area for those who seek a quieter and more restful holiday place. The natural areas of Beeston Common{(an area of {special scientific interest),}Pretty Corner and Runton beach are popular.
